imdb.query:
SELECT title, director
FROM imdb.title, analogy('Godfather', 'Francis_Ford_Coppola', title) AS director
WHERE director != ''
LIMIT 100

SELECT token, grouptoken
FROM groups(ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(title, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM imdb.title
WHERE title NOT LIKE '%''%' LIMIT 1000), '{Europe,America}')

SELECT keyword, cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') FROM imdb.keyword AS k
INNER JOIN google_vecs ON google_vecs.word = k.keyword
ORDER BY cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, ANN.word FROM imdb.title, knn(title.title, 5) AS ANN LIMIT 100
SELECT ANN.word FROM knn_in('Godfather', 5, ARRAY(SELECT title::varchar(80) FROM imdb.title)) AS ANN

discogs.query:
SELECT * FROM knn_batch(ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(name, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM discogs.artist
TABLESAMPLE system(0.1)), 5)
discogs.description: Find 5 nearest neighbours for random artist names as a batch query

discogs.query:
SELECT q.title, cosine_similarity(q.title, 'Unknown_Pleasures')
FROM ((SELECT regexp_replace(title, ' ', '_', 'g') AS title FROM discogs.master WHERE 'Rock' = ANY(genres)) AS m
INNER JOIN google_vecs ON google_vecs.word = m.title) AS q
ORDER BY cosine_similarity(title, 'Unknown_Pleasures') DESC LIMIT 10
discogs.description: Find 10 most similar rock albums to Joy Division's "Unknown Pleasures"

discogs.query: SELECT ANN.word FROM knn_in('Beatles', 5, ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(name, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM discogs.artist)) AS ANN
SELECT title, ANN.word FROM discogs.master, knn(title, 5) AS ANN LIMIT 100

SELECT token, grouptoken
FROM groups(ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(name, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM discogs.artist TABLESAMPLE system(0.1)
WHERE name NOT LIKE '%''%' LIMIT 1000), '{Classical,Rock,Pop,Electronic,Jazz,Blues,Hip-Hop,Reggae}')
